mapper.sql: select id, vin, mileage, name, begin_register_date, color, engine_capacity, function, engine_number, manufacture_date, year_insurance, plate_num, transfer_number, auto_nature, create_time, create_user, status, car_photo, certificate_photo, other_photo, color_cn, region_id, auto_brand, auto_brand_cn, auto_style, auto_style_cn, auto_series, auto_series_cn, edit_time, auto_id from car_assess
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, vin, mileage, NAME, begin_register_date, color, engine_capacity, FUNCTION, engine_number, manufacture_date, year_insurance, plate_num, transfer_number, auto_nature, create_time, create_user, a.STATUS, car_photo, certificate_photo, other_photo, color_cn, region_id, auto_brand, auto_brand_cn, auto_style, auto_style_cn, auto_series, auto_series_cn, edit_time, auto_id, o.id AS order_id, o.price, o.STATUS AS order_status, o.remark, o.assess_id, o.follow_id, o.procurement_type, o.procurement_date, o.store_id, o.if_old_new, o.entirety_price, o.new_car_price, o.car_address, o.purchase_tax, o.driving_license, o.registration_certificate, o.if_add, o.car_keys, o.new_car_invoice, o.quality_guarantee, o.maintenance_manual, o.sali, o.sali_end_date, o.commercial_insurance, o.commercial_insurance_end_date, o.commercial_insurance_price, o.transport_tax, o.transport_tax_end_date, o.customer_name, o.customer_tel, o.customer_source FROM car_assess a LEFT JOIN car_assess_order o on o.assess_id = a.id where a.id = #{id}
